summary: Ben is a young editor for a famous german music magazine in the mid 1990s. His life is falling apart after his girlfriend breaks up with him. From now on he decides to go solo...
cast: Matthias Schweighöfer|Nora Tschirner|Oliver Wnuk|Christian Näthe|Lisa Maria Potthoff|Leander Haußmann|Matthias Matschke|Sandy Mölling|Thomas D|Julia Dietze|Wanda Perdelwitz|Thorsten Feller|Frank Kusche
title: Soloalbum
